mapper.select: ( select count(*) from oe_focus of inner join oe_user as ou on of.user_id =ou.id where of.lecturer_id =#{userId} and ou.status = 0 and ou.is_delete =0 ) UNION ALL ( select count(*) from oe_focus of inner join course_anchor as ou on of.lecturer_id = ou.user_id where of.user_id =#{userId} and ou.status = 1 and ou.deleted =0 ) UNION ALL ( select count(*) from oe_criticize cc inner join course_anchor as ou on cc.user_id =ou.user_id where cc.user_id = #{userId} and cc.create_person is not null and ou.status = 1 and ou.deleted =0 )

select of.lecturer_id as userId,ou.name as name,ou.profile_photo as smallHeadPhoto, ou.`detail`,ou.type from oe_focus as of inner join course_anchor as ou on of.lecturer_id = ou.user_id where of.user_id =#{userId} and ou.status = 1 and ou.deleted =0 order by of.create_time desc
